name: Get Four (Victory Software)
overview: Try to get four in a row before your opponent does. Your piece goes to the lowest position in the column you pick. Get Four is the classic vertical game of tic-tac-toe. Play against a friend or the computer as you try to get four in a row. The computer can play one of four different strategies. Released as part of the Victory Software Strategy Pack I along with Mancala and Victory Casino.
